channel.title: Swift App School
channel.description:
Learn to code. Build Apps. Inspire the next generation!
Swift App School is committed to teaching the youth of tomorrow all about developing apps and writing Swift code. Our goal is to help young people learn the fundamentals of creating apps by teaching them Swift, Apple's open-source programming language.
We are empowering the next generation of great app developers!
This podcast station will focus on general news about Computer Science, Artificial Intelligence, and STEM. We also discuss iOS App Development, Apple in the news, and finally something cool that we discovered.
channel.author: Swift App School
channel.itunes:author: Swift App School
channel.itunes:summary:
Learn to code. Build Apps. Inspire the next generation!
Swift App School is committed to teaching the youth of tomorrow all about developing apps and writing Swift code. Our goal is to help young people learn the fundamentals of creating apps by teaching them Swift, Apple's open-source programming language.
We are empowering the next generation of great app developers!
This podcast station will focus on general news about Computer Science, Artificial Intelligence, and STEM. We also discuss iOS App Development, Apple in the news, and finally something cool that we discovered.

item.title: S2 - E4. Our Challenging 2024 | App Camp and What's Next For Swift App School | Apple’s 2024 Events | Something Cool!
item.description:
In this episode, you hear from Charles Long and Bob Williams, Co-Founders of Swift App School. 


Timestamps:

00:26 Losing Our Fathers and Hurricane Helene

08:17 2024 Summer App Camp

19:14 OpenDoors Asheville Partnership and Our Future STEM Nonprofit Coming Soon

25:33 Apple In The News

57:10 Something cool!


We hope you enjoy our episode!

item.title: S2 - E3. CS Ed Week | App Camp | MacStadium Case Study | Apple’s 2023 Events
item.description:
In this episode, you hear from Charles Long and Bob Williams, Co-Founders of Swift App School. 


Timestamps:

00:44 Computer Science Education Week

05:24 2023 Summer App Camp

11:20 MacStadium Case study

18:45 Apple’s September “Wonderlust” Event

37:14 Apple’s October “Scary Fast” Event


Something Cool:

44:34 Apple + RCS?

50:16 Personal Voice Ad

52:14 AI Pin by Humane


We hope you enjoy our episode!


Links:

https://www.csedweek.org

item.title: Season 2 Begins! What's New With Swift App School | Advancements With AI and ChatGPT | Apple In The News | Something Cool!
item.description:
In this episode, you hear from Charles Long and Bob Williams, Co-Founders of Swift App School.
Timestamps:
01:19 Holidays 07:19 What’s New With Swift App School 18:06 Major Advancements Of AI & ChatGPT Discussion
Apple In The News: 54:06 Apple Releases New Computers! 59:55 Apple Store Changes & New Classical Music App 01:03:56 Something Cool!
We hope you enjoy our episode!
Links: Atomic Habits Book: Shout out to MacStadium
2023 Summer App Camp
Hatch Innovation Hub
Artificial Intelligence https://venturebeat.com/ai/from-dall-e-2-to-chatgpt-covering-ais-wild-year-the-ai-beat/
DALL-E 2: https://openai.com/product/dall-e-2
ChatGPT: https://openai.com/blog/chatgpt
MidJourney: https://www.midjourney.com
Stable Diffusion AI: https://stability.ai/blog/stable-diffusion-public-release The power of ChatGPT: https://finance.yahoo.com/news/chatgpt-on-track-to-surpass-100-million-users-faster-than-tiktok-or-instagram-ubs-214423357.html https://www.youtube.com/watch?app=desktop&v=HTWfA7KFzoA
With ChatGPT and Microsoft support, is Google in trouble? https://openai.com/blog/openai-and-microsoft-extend-partnership https://www.theverge.com/2023/1/9/23546144/microsoft-openai-word-powerpoint-outlook-gpt-integration-rumor https://www.cnbc.com/2022/12/15/google-vs-chatgpt-what-happened-when-i-swapped-services-for-a-day.html https://www.cnet.com/tech/services-and-software/chatgpt-caused-code-red-at-google-report-says/ https://www.businessinsider.com/bing-chatgpt-google-faces-first-real-competition-in-20-years-2023-1 https://www.firstpost.com/world/chatgpt-can-destroy-google-search-in-two-years-says-gmail-creator-12070222.html https://www.theverge.com/2023/1/4/23538552/microsoft-bing-chatgpt-search-google-competition Competition Responses to ChatGPT: https://blog.google/technology/ai/bard-google-ai-search-updates/ https://www.engadget.com/meta-is-working-on-ai-personas-for-instagram-messenger-and-whatsapp-223316961.html
ChatGPT and the Job Industry: https://www.datanami.com/2021/08/09/we-need-to-prepare-for-tomorrows-ai-job-impacts-now/ https://www.the-sun.com/tech/7211994/lose-job-ai-chatgpt-work-hour-seconds/ https://www.cnn.com/2023/01/28/tech/chatgpt-real-estate/index.html https://www.inc.com/eric-holtzclaw/ive-been-using-chatgpt-for-my-business-for-a-month-its-already-saved-me-40-hours-7500.html
ChatGPT in Education: https://thehill.com/policy/technology/3816348-what-is-chatgpt-ai-technology-sends-schools-scrambling-to-preserve-learning/ https://www.theguardian.com/australia-news/2023/jan/10/universities-to-return-to-pen-and-paper-exams-after-students-caught-using-ai-to-write-essays https://www.wired.com/story/chatgpt-is-coming-for-classrooms-dont-panic/ https://www.businessinsider.com/education-experts-teachers-generative-ai-chatgpt-classroom-2023-1 https://blogs.microsoft.com/blog/2023/02/07/reinventing-search-with-a-new-ai-powered-microsoft-bing-and-edge-your-copilot-for-the-web/
Products and Apps Mentioned: Samsung Odyssey Neo G9 AirPods Pro New Mac Minis with M2 and M2 Pro Chips New MacBook Pros with M2 Pro / Max Chips App Store Pricing Changes New Apple Music Classical App
Apple Music SingMusic provided by "https://ncs.io/aperture"

item.title: S1-E13. First Impressions From Apple's Latest Releases | Apple's Design Chief Leaving? | Will Apple Remove "Hey" Keyword To Wake Siri? | Something Cool!
item.description:
In this episode, you hear from Charles Long and Bob Williams, Co-Founders of Swift App School.
Timestamps: First impressions from Apple's latest releases: 01:50 iPhone 14 and related news 16:02 New iPads - The Good, The Bad and the Ugly 26:18 macOS Ventura 36:51 Apple Watch Ultra 39:00 Air Pods Pro
Apple In The News: 41:00 Apple's Design Chief Is Leaving? 46:01 Will Apple remove the "Hey" keyword to wake Siri?
Something Really Cool! 48:32 Center Stage feature
We hope you enjoy our episode!
Links: iPhone 14 / iPhone 14 Pro https://www.apple.com/iphone/ 2022 iPad / iPad Pro https://www.apple.com/ipad/ macOS Ventura https://www.apple.com/macos/ventura/ Apple Watch Ultra https://www.apple.com/apple-watch-ultra/ Air Pods Pro https://www.apple.com/airpods-pro/ Evans Hankey (Industrial Design Leaving Apple https://www.theverge.com/2022/10/21/23416334/apple-evans-hankey-industrial-design-leaving Will Apple remove the "Hey" keyword to wake Siri? https://gizmodo.com/apple-hey-siri-wake-trigger-change-google-amazon-alexa-1849753396 Something Cool - Center Stage https://youtu.be/S-4Bph5fuuU
Music provided by "https://ncs.io/aperture"

item.title: S1-E11. 2022 App Camp Recap and USA Taking Computer Science Seriously!
item.description:
In this episode you hear from Charles Long and Bob Williams, Co-Founders of Swift App School.
Timestamps: 01:24 Shout Outs 03:35 Recap of 2022 App Camp 29:02 Computer Science Is Being Taken Seriously! 40:34 Something cool
We hope you enjoy our episode!
Links: K-12 Computer Science Creating A Case For Full-Time Status In Schools https://www.forbes.com/sites/rodberger/2022/05/26/k-12-computer-science-creating-a-case-for-full-time-status-in-schools/?sh=4423dd7133e9
CEOs for Computer Science https://www.ceosforcs.com
US Governors Vow To Boost Computer Science Education at School After Business Push https://www.usnews.com/news/us/articles/2022-07-15/u-s-governors-vow-to-boost-computer-science-education-at-schools-after-business-push
Something Cool - Snapchat CEO pays off an entire graduation class debt https://www.latimes.com/california/story/2022-05-15/snapchat-co-founder-pays-off-college-debt-of-new-graduates-at-l-a-art-and-design-school
Shout Outs: Podcast listener: JSR984
Keynon Lake (MDMT) https://mydaddytaughtmethat.org
Boys & Girls Club of Hendersonville https://bgchendersonco.org
OpenDoors of Asheville https://opendoorsasheville.org
Young Eisner Scholars (YES) https://www.yesscholars.org
Daniel Steinberg https://dimsumthinking.com
Paul Hudson (Hacking With Swift) https://www.hackingwithswift.com
Special thanks to: Clara Long Robbie Henry Matthew Addie

item.title: S1-E8. Interview With Guy Kawasaki
item.description:
In this episode you hear from Charles Long and Bob Williams, Co-Founders of Swift App School as they interview the man, the myth, the legend, Guy Kawasaki! 

Timestamps: 

00:24 About Guy Kawasaki, Early Macintosh Days, Steve Jobs 

13:38 Advice For Young Aspiring Entrepreneurs 

19:35 What Apple Is Doing Right and Wrong 

28:08 About The Remarkable People Podcast 

33:38 Bootstrapping Vs Raising Capital? 

38:32 Diversity Discussion And More 

We hope you enjoy our episode! 


Guy Kawasaki

Remarkable People:  https://podcasts.apple.com/us/podcast/guy-kawasakis-remarkable-people/id1483081827

https://guykawasaki.com Mix08 Conference (Guy Kawasaki Interviewing Steve Ballmer) 

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=9-F139UX94A 

Stanford Talks: Guy Kawasaki: Make Meaning in Your Company Make a great pitch Ideas - what make them successful

item.title: S1-E6. Apps By Black Developers | Scrolling In Our App | Facebook Blames Apple For Losses
item.description: In this episode you hear from Charles Long and Bob Williams, Co-Founders of Swift App School. Timestamps: 01:02 2022 App Camp! 02:00 7 Apps Created By Black Developers 15:22 Implementing Custom Scrolling In Our App 32:27 Facebook Blaming Apple For Record Losses 38:07 Something cool! We hope you enjoy our episode! Links: 7 Apps Created By Black Developers Inspired By The Black Community https://www.codecademy.com/resources/blog/apps-built-by-black-developers/ A Strategy For Great Work by Ken Kocienda https://devstreaming-cdn.apple.com/videos/wwdc/2014/237xxcyp7vhx2xt/237/237_a_strategy_for_great_work.pdf Facebook blames Apple after a historically bad quarter, saying iPhone privacy changes will cost it $10 billion https://www.businessinsider.com/facebook-blames-apple-10-billion-loss-ad-privacy-warning-2022-2 Something cool! Georgia couple becomes first African-American owners of an autonomous grocery store https://flipboard.com/video/waga/454fd783c8 Music provided by "https://ncs.io/aperture"

item.title: S1-E5. All Things Code - Apple Watch App | iMessage And The Rest Of Apple's Glorious Ecosystem (Walled Garden) | Something Cool!
item.description:
In this episode you hear from Charles Long and Bob Williams, Co-Founders of Swift App School. Timestamps: 01:13 Bob's experience developing an Apple Watch App 11:15 Blue vs Green Bubles..... Is Apple Responsible for assisting bullying? - The History of SMS, MMS and iMessage 22:21 Apple's Ecosystem aka "The Walled Garden" 39:33 Something cool!
We hope you enjoy our episode!
Links: Apple's Messages
https://appleinsider.com/articles/22/01/10/apple-uses-messages-colors-to-bully-android-users-says-google https://www.macworld.com/article/606152/imessage-green-bubbles-sms-rcs-reactions.html
Apple's Ecosystem
MKBHD - Blue Bubbles vs Green Bubbles Explained: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=BuaKzm7Kq9Q MKBHD explains Apple's Ecosystem: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=KB4_WIPE7vo Universal Control: https://youtu.be/P4ut_Vk-Z9w
Something cool
Camo Studio: https://reincubate.com/camo/ Launched Podcast - Episode 38: https://podcasts.apple.com/us/podcast/launched/id1491582246?i=1000548946734 Music provided by "https://ncs.io/aperture"

item.title: S1-E4. Our Holidays, Remembering Techie Gifts, Resolutions | All Things Code & iPad Can Build Apps | Talent Acquisition and Retention
item.description:
In this episode you hear from Charles Long and Bob Williams, Co-Founders of Swift App School.

Timestamps:

0:26 Our Holiday Break, Our First Techie Gifts, New Years Resolutions

16:00 All Things Code - Codementor

19:20 Use Swift Playgrounds on iPad to publish apps on the App Store!

25:23 Apple and other tech companies dealing with talent acquisition and retention

38:40 Something cool!

We hope you enjoy our episode!

Links:

Codementor : https://www.codementor.io

Swift Playground on iPad can now develop apps:

https://www.cultofmac.com/761346/apple-rolls-out-swift-playgrounds-4/

Apple and other tech companies dealing with talent acquisition and retention:

https://interestingengineering.com/apple-pays-its-engineers-180000-bonuses-to-stop-them-from-joining-meta

https://www.neowin.net/news/apple-silicon-lead-processor-developer-jeff-wilcox-leaves-to-rejoin-intel-to-design-socs/

item.title: S1-E3. Computer Science Education Week | Breaking The Diversity Barrier | Girls and STEM and more!
item.description:
In this episode you hear from Charles Long and Bob Williams, Co-Founders of Swift App School.

Timestamps:

01:22 All Things Code - Computer Science Education Week

06:02 Breaking The Diversity Barrier

14:48 Girls and STEM

35:23 iOS / Mac Development  - Just Dive Into Code

40:57 Something Cool!

We hope you enjoy our episode!


Links:

CS Ed Week - https://www.csedweek.org

Computer Science Teachers Association - https://www.csteachers.org

The Hour Of Code - Code.org


Girls and STEM:

https://theconversation.com/stereotypes-about-girls-dissuade-many-from-careers-in-computer-science-172279

https://www.blackgirlscode.com

http://digitalyouthnetwork.org/divas/

https://goldieblox.com

Dr Darden and Michell Obama speak at WWDC 2017 - https://www.cultofmac.com/485524/wwdc-michael-obama-says-diversity-key-innovation/


Other CS Ed Week Resources:

Apple:

Diversity in Swift - https://www.swift.org/diversity

Scholarships to HACUs - https://www.hacu.net/NewsBot.asp?MODE=VIEW&ID=3454


Flipgrid (Microsoft) discussion on Race, Equity and Justice in Computer Science Education

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=2EwatWnRji0


Google - https://edu.google.com/code-with-google/csedweek/


Non-Profit Organizations:

Young Eisner Scholars - https://www.yesscholars.org

My Daddy Taught Me That - https://mydaddytaughtmethat.org

Hatch Foundation - http://hatchavl.org


Coding Resources:

Paul Hudson - https://hackingwithswift.com

Sean Allen - www.seanallen.co


Other Links:

Ultra compact camera - https://www.sciencealert.com/this-new-ultracompact-camera-is-the-size-of-a-grain-of-salt


Music provided by "https://ncs.io/aperture"

item.title: Season 1 Episode 1 - Our Mission To Give Back To The Youth!
item.description:
In this episode you hear from Charles Long and Bob Williams, Co-Founders of Swift App School. 

In the first segment you will hear a brief segment of our backstory and our mission to give back to the youth by teaching Computer Science through interactive project based app development camps!  

In the second segment we briefly discuss the state of Computer Science education in the USA. 

In the third segment we showcase Apple in the news and finally wrap up with something cool!

We hope you enjoy our first episode!


Links:

Swift App School website

2021 State of CS report shows half of U.S. high schools offer CS, but disparities still exist

Music provided by "https://ncs.io/aperture"
